item.title: Music - what fits where?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Hmm, kinda a difficult question since it’s so broad. If you have a suspenseful game or scene, you obviously want to use a much faster song or music, to emphasize rapidity and change. If it’s a slow, calm or serene scene, you want sounds of nature, or maybe a piano playing. Music is great to change the mood of how the player should be feeling in any given scenario.

These principles are more based on movies than games. I think a lot can be improved with music in the gaming industry, but maybe that’s just me.
